data.name: Rule0014PermissionSetCaptionLengthDescription
data.value: The Caption of permissionset objects should not exceed the maximum length.

data.name: Rule0014PermissionSetCaptionLengthFormat

data.name: Rule0014PermissionSetCaptionLengthTitle
data.value: The Caption of permissionset objects should not exceed the maximum length.

data.name: Rule0015PermissionSetCoverageTitle
data.value: All application objects should be covered by at least one permission set in the extension.
